item.description:
I am amazed at the people that are afraid to love themselves whole heartedly. The saying "IT is all about Me" should be everyones motto!! If we each nurtured ourselves and did what our intuition tried to tell us we would be so a lot more in the groove, happier and in a place where we could serve the world from a much stronger place.

 

So let's talk about that and how to make those changes for a better us and a better world!

On June 30th we will have a great program on Self Confidence and work away around Self Esteem, winding down with the history that created the LACK OF in the first place.  Everyone will walk away with a great feeling of self love and importance. With these new tools more opportunity and possiblities come knocking at your door!

group.name: Abundance, Empowerment and the Law of Attraction

item.name: Unleasing Your Self Confidence, Using the Law of Attraction for You!!!
